name: whileInputEffect
signature: { <In, R2>(f: (input: In) => Effect<boolean, never, R2>): <Out, R>(self: Schedule<Out, In, R>) => Schedule<Out, In, R2 | R>; <Out, In, R, R2>(self: Schedule<Out, In, R>, f: (input: In) => Effect<boolean, never, R2>): Schedule<Out, In, R | R2>; }
description:
Returns a new schedule that continues execution for as long as the given
effectful predicate on the input evaluates to `true`.
*Details This function modifies an existing schedule so that it only continues
execution while an effectful predicate holds true for its input. If the
predicate evaluates to `false` at any step, the schedule stops.
